item.title: Conference Bridge to Everywhere
item.description:
Conference bridges connect multiple phone lines, allowing people in different locations to talk together. While large companies might buy this equipment, it’s more affordable for others to pay as they go. CogniConference is a budget-friendly service for organizing and participating in conference calls. It works well for audio-only calls using speakerphones or handsets. Additionally, it can provide audio for web conferences using tools like GotoMeeting. While managed teleconferencing can be pricey, CogniConference aims for affordability, flexibility, and high-quality...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/conference-bridge-to-everywhere/

item.title: Advantages of Virtual Business Travel
item.description:
At the start of this new year and decade, it’s a great opportunity to reconsider some ingrained habits, like business travel. Do you eagerly anticipate it or dread the idea? As a manager, do you advocate for large travel budgets because your team enjoys it and sees a significant return on investment? Or does the thought make you slightly uncomfortable? If you identify with the latter sentiment, you might discover significant advantages in replacing a large portion of your in-person business travel with virtual alternatives...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/advantages-of-virtual-business-travel/

item.title: The Value of Low Latency Fiber Optic Connections
item.description:
By: John Shepler Slow network speeds, particularly when connecting to the internet or other company sites, could point to a latency problem. Let’s explore how businesses and organizations can achieve faster network connections: For businesses that rely on high-speed network performance, like high-frequency financial trading, minimizing latency is crucial. Some companies even choose to be in the same building as stock exchanges to be just feet away from servers. While most applications aren’t that demanding, factors like bandwidth, latency, packet loss, and jitter still matter...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-value-of-low-latency-fiber-optic-connections/

item.title: A Map to Unified Communications and Collaboration
item.description:
Infographic provided by Level 3 Communications Modern workplaces rely on tools like web conferencing, screen sharing, presence technology, and teleconferencing to enhance employee productivity and knowledge sharing. Unsure if your business is utilizing these tools effectively? Learn more about the latest in Unified Communications and Collaboration solutions from industry leaders like Level 3 Communications...
